sentences.en: A Malaysian flower mantis, which crouches among flowers awaiting unsuspecting prey.
sentences.cn: 一只马来西亚花螳螂, 蜷缩在鲜花中等待不期而遇的猎物.

sentences.en: Fake designer clothes are being sold to an unsuspecting public.
sentences.cn: 有冒牌的设计师服装正在向毫不知情的大众出售。

sentences.en: Finally, an unsuspecting patron spilled the beans, and Mr. Perry got his man.
sentences.cn: 终于一位不设防的客人泄露了天机,佩里得到了这个人的名字.
他捏了一下那个毫无戒心的女孩的屁股.

sentences.en: He had crept up on his unsuspecting victim from behind.
sentences.cn: 他从背后悄悄逼近了那毫无戒备的受害者。

sentences.en: Most plant species are protected by laws carrying stiff fines, even for unsuspecting tourists.
sentences.cn: 大部分品种的花都受到高额罚款的法律条文保护, 甚至连不知情的观光客也照罚不误.
数不清的陷阱等待毫无戒心的投资者.

sentences.en: She overtipped the unsuspecting, decent man - her porter.
sentences.cn: 她多付了些小费给那个对人信而不疑, 庄重正经的男子 -- 搬运工.

sentences.en: Suppose a single unsuspecting man was on the siding?
sentences.cn: 当然会,你可以救五条人命,不付出代价.

sentences.en: The clerk passed off a synthetic diamond to that unsuspecting customer.
sentences.cn: 这个店员用人造钻石冒充真货卖给了那个轻信的顾客.

sentences.en: The monkeys scare passers - by, and occasionally bite or snatch food from unsuspecting visitors.
sentences.cn: 这些猴子惊吓行人, 偶尔还会冷不防的从游客那里咬走或抢夺食物.

sentences.en: They advanced on their unsuspecting brother.
sentences.cn: 他们朝他们无怀疑的兄弟进攻.

sentences.en: This is an enemy who preys on innocent and unsuspecting people.
sentences.cn: 他们对无辜的、毫无警觉的平民下毒手.

sentences.en: Those are foisted on an unsuspecting public.
sentences.cn: 那些被骗售给了不明真相的公众.

sentences.en: We were unsuspecting of the fact that he was the very boss there.
sentences.cn: 我们没料想到他就是那里的老板.

sentences.en: When the hunter saw the unsuspecting mountain buck, he shot his arrow and killed him instantly.
sentences.cn: 猎人看到这只意外出现的山鹿, 立马射箭杀死了他.

trans.tran_cn: 不怀疑的，无猜疑的，可信任的，未料到的，未猜想到的
trans.tran_en: not knowing that something bad is happening or going to happen
